html:
1.20.18  2:03 pm   What's your favorite palindrome?

     boob

1.20.18  1:55 pm   Frogs?

     ah, i see what you are asking

1.20.18  1:48 pm   what's your favourite video on youtube?

     the one with the person at the zoo

1.20.18  1:48 pm   you donâ€™t have to answer this, and i donâ€™t mean to come off as rude or assumptious!! a lot of people ask you if you have certain mental disorders, and i understand why you wouldnâ€™t want to answer them. i just want you to know that if you do have a mental disorder, itâ€™s okay!! i have schizophrenia and i donâ€™t know i just wanted you to know that

     to determine whether someone has a mental disorder, it is important to determine what the correct mental order should be. i have it written down somewhere

1.20.18  1:44 pm   would you recommend a dog or a cat this is a genuine question

     for what purpose

1.20.18  1:44 pm   what are you like?

     i've been trying to demonstrate for many years now

1.20.18  1:43 pm   at 2:12 in la de da. are you visually calling your fans sheep?

     no

1.20.18  1:42 pm   would you ever consider wearing a cowboy hat

     i was gonna say no but now that i think about it yes

1.20.18  12:45 pm   How many years of music theory did you take? 

     i wasn't keeping track of the time

1.20.18  12:14 pm   opinion on seashells???

     they sell better when they are further away from the sea

1.20.18  12:10 pm   how would you describe your mind?

     by demonstrating

1.20.18  12:01 pm   how do you spend your time when you arent making videos or answering questions here?

     anagrams, tweets, and various other things related to the bill wurtz brand, and billwurtz dot com

1.20.18  12:00 pm   what's your favorite polygon?

     triangle

1.20.18  11:54 am   what's your background in music and composition? 

     doing music, and composing it

1.20.18  11:33 am   Hi bill, why don't you ever use smiley faces (emoticones?) when answering questions?

     it doesn't seem necessary, and it can also cause formatting problems across different devices

     (I've been here for a long time and haven't seen you use it) I actually really like that you don't, just wondering if it's part of your writing ethics, if there's a specific reason. Thanks for taking the time to answer my questions.

1.20.18  11:32 am   Why do you think you get so much flack when you answer questions about music theory? I think maybe some people are very anti-theory because they see it as being "The Rulebook" or "The Definitive Guide of How to Make Music" and you MUST follow these strict rules to be a 'serious musician'?.. But really, there are no 'rules' in theory...

     i feel like i keep trying to explain that to people over and over again

      Isnt theory just giving names to things that already exist?

     yes

     Like just saying that this combination of notes is called this chord or that scale or whatever? 

     yes. and it could never actually represent the sound entirely accurately

1.20.18  11:29 am   is it ok to be shy?

     sure

     i have a hard time approaching people and everyone thinks i have attitude issues for no good reason

     what is their excuse for not approaching you

1.20.18  11:16 am   Have you thought about covering somebody else's song but with your own style? 

     oh hell yeah

1.20.18  11:13 am   happy birthday bill!

     thank you

1.20.18  10:28 am   Have you ever considered / are you setting up any further steps in your musical journey?

     i always have

     I'd like to see someone like you, especially if its you, making feel-good and catchy songs that are played on the radio? To improve our general quality of music nowadays? Personally your music deserves as much publicity as your "the history of everything" videos.   

     having songs on the radio has always been a goal of mine, ever since i was very young. now there are actually multiple radios, and i would love to reach them all if possible

1.20.18  10:24 am   In your video you call "snail time"... where is the logic in it?

     the title is 'snail time', and in the video, snails fly accross the screen. it is almost as if it's time for the snails, to come flying across the screen. and as soon as you hit play, lo and behold, they do

     Do the snails go to jail?

     no, they just disappear from the screen

     Does the watchers go to jail?

     only in their imagination

     Is it a buddhist ritual that only supreme people will know!

     no

1.20.18  10:22 am   Whats the magic word?

     every word is magic

1.20.18  9:50 am   do you have any other hobbies than music and history videos?

     yes. actually history is not a hobby any more. last year i did way too much

1.20.18  9:18 am   Are you working on anything new?

     i have been working on new material constantly since at least 2014

1.20.18  7:55 am   my friend showed me a test to find out if you were weird, and it gave me a thought. What is weird? I feel like its too loose of a term and has too many meanings. What is your view on this?

     i think it just means something outside the realm of what someone is expecting

1.20.18  7:38 am   Tell me a lie 

     i will do it when i get a chance

1.20.18  7:35 am   Do you consider your style retro

     no

      or something completely unique?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.20.18  5:41 am   How much activity does this specific page get?

     you don't wanna know

1.20.18  5:37 am   I'm sure you get asked this a lot, but do you have a set script when you write your videos or do you just make it as it comes?  Thanks, bill!

     i've found that i get much stronger results when i write first

1.20.18  5:27 am   hey bill what do you think is more useful learning a major scale in all 12 keys or learning modes? because you could take that major scale pull modes chords etc from it whats your opinion?

     learn songs?

1.20.18  4:35 am   I've heard from one of your reality videos that you wanted to do a behind the scenes or journal, is that idea still up in the air?

     i think what i meant by that was the reality section itself, which had not been made yet at that time

1.20.18  3:11 am   help i took a wrong turn

     make a few more and you should be all set

1.20.18  2:31 am   how do you write your music?

     i just try to imagine how i want it to go, then i document that

1.20.18  1:27 am   What do you think about your fans?

     i don't know most of them

      Do you feel you have a sort of relationship with them as a community? 

     each one could be in a different community. they could be in any community

1.20.18  1:25 am   Are you a big fan of your old videos?

     i don't watch them, because i am busy making new ones

1.20.18  12:50 am   If horses wore pants would they wear them on the back legs only or all four legs?

     whatever the horse prefers. or if the horse is a slave, whatever the horse's master prefers

1.20.18  12:45 am   What was the inspiration for "Monday good firetruck"? It's so jarring compared to your other work.

     after so many mondays, it was time to get a bit loopy

1.20.18  12:24 am   did you ever find meaning in a thing you wrote a long time after you've written? have you found out deep stuff about yourself?

     sometimes

1.20.18  12:15 am   How many cats do you have?

     0

1.20.18  12:11 am   how come you dont do better merch than you currently offer????? 

     i think the real question is, why do i do merch at all considering the idea of merch makes me want to vomit out of my ears

1.19.18  11:45 pm   How much time do you spend working on projects each day on average?

     as much as humanly possible

1.19.18  11:16 pm   I feel like it takes a stupid amount of willpower for me to do anything, let alone work on actual creative projects. Any tips?

     try smaller projects first. it's easier

1.19.18  11:06 pm   are you still a big fan of TIME and S P A C E?

     yes

1.19.18  11:01 pm   How does it feel to see your work become popular and massive on youtube and other sites?

     nice, very good

1.19.18  10:59 pm   What would cause you to release an album instead of a song, if anything?

     maybe if it became illegal to release singles

1.19.18  10:53 pm   What license do you publish your songs under? (Creative Commons, etc.)

     ©bill wurtz, all rights reserved

1.19.18  10:53 pm   You say that you won't have enough time to finish all of your projects. Do you think you'll ever find an efficient way to get your projects done faster and have the quality of content you want?

     that is something i strive for each and every day

1.19.18  10:43 pm   do you listen to a lot of music?

     yes

     if so, what artists/bands are you into right now?

     i do not discriminate

1.19.18  10:40 pm   what is that "got no home" at the end of la de da about?

     adding a twist to the end

1.19.18  10:37 pm   Why do you do it

     do what
